JOB DESCRIPTION: Lead a team of Software Engineers with diverse capability in development of banking web applications enhancement and bug fixing of existing web applications.Development of web application components and interfaces specializing in banking applications using the latest web technologies including Angular, TypeScript, NodeJS, Spring boot and hibernate.Delivering status updates to the management and stakeholders regularly.Debugging critical issues at production level.High collaboration and contribution across roles such as Developers, Product owners, Leads, Project Managers and ClientsDesired ProfileBanking experience would be an added advantageAbility to work on strict time-lines with focus on time delivery.Experience on working with Finance domain (Fin tech) including various payment types and transfer modes like (IMPS, RTGS, and NEFT).Good knowledge of continuous integration and version management.Ability to work in frequently changing requirements and features
